sentences: Michele "Miki" Del Prete (born 23 July 1935) is an Italian lyricist and record producer.
Born in Bari, at young age he moved to Milan with his family, following the transfer of his father, a footballer, from A.S. Bari to Calcio Como.
In the 1950s Del Prete started his career as a professional dancer.
In 1959, he became a close friend and a collaborator of Adriano Celentano.
